definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: So far, there has been no resistance to antileprosy treatment when used as MDT.
sentences.chinese: 迄今，对使用联合化疗的抗麻风治疗无抗药性。

sentences.english: Objective To construct a stable-transfected cell line of the chymotrypsin gene from deltamethrin resistant Culex pipiens pallens.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立抗药性相关糜蛋白酶基因稳定转染细胞系。

sentences.english: Overusing antiviral drugs can help germs become resistant to them.
sentences.chinese: 过度使用抗病毒药会帮助病菌产生抗药性。

sentences.english: Thus it is only a matter of when, not if, some insects develop resistance to Bt.
sentences.chinese: 因此昆虫产生抗药性也只是一个时间的问题。

sentences.english: The resistance of aphid is related to activity of hydrolase of aphid.
sentences.chinese: 棉蚜的抗药性增加与体内水解酯酶活力有关。

sentences.english: She says the parasite expels the drug drugs, causing resistance to medications.
sentences.chinese: 他说寄生虫排除药，从而引起了抗药性。

sentences.english: The evolution of drug-resistant Plasmodium strains, especially those resistant to chloroquine, has had major impacts on global public health.
sentences.chinese: 抗药性疟原虫的发生已经严重影响到全球健康。

sentences.english: Antibacterial Auxogen, no-drug resistance, and safety to use.
sentences.chinese: 抗菌促生长剂，无抗药性，使用安全。

sentences.english: Butthe malaria parasite has become resistant to chloroquine and quinine.
sentences.chinese: 但是疟疾寄生虫已变得对氯奎和奎宁有抗药性。

sentences.english: The resistance of green peach aphids to insecticides results mainly from the enhance the levels of the E4 carboxylesterase.
sentences.chinese: 桃蚜的抗药性主要是由羧酸酯酶E4扩增引起的。

sentences.english: Methods : Use velum contacting method to mensurate resistance of drug.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用药膜接触法测定抗药性。

sentences.english: But the malaria parasite has become resistant to chloroquine and quinine.
sentences.chinese: 但是疟疾寄生虫已变得对氯奎和奎宁有抗药性。

sentences.english: Mexico's swine flu virus resistant to the previous, such as rimantadine.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥的猪流感病毒的抗药性前，如金刚乙胺。

sentences.english: Objective To study the resistance of domestic rodents to anticoagulant rodenticide in Longmen County.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解龙门县家栖鼠对抗凝血杀鼠剂的抗药性。

sentences.english: Drug-resistant staph really exploded in healthcare.
sentences.chinese: 抗药性葡萄球菌已经在医疗系统爆发。

definition: every medicine has its side effect
